tokens.text: uses composters to make bone meal

generated_doNotEdit.title: Work Composter Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the NPC to use the composter POI to convert excess seeds into bone meal.

fields.title: Active Time
fields.description: The amount of ticks the NPC will stay in their the work location

fields.title: Block Interaction Max
fields.description: The maximum number of times the mob will interact with the composter.

fields.title: Can Empty Composter
fields.description: Determines whether the mob can empty a full composter.

fields.title: Can Fill Composter
fields.description: Determines whether the mob can add items to a composter given that it is not full.

fields.title: Can Work In Rain
fields.description: If true, this entity can work when their jobsite POI is being rained on.

fields.title: Goal Cooldown
fields.description: The amount of ticks the goal will be on cooldown before it can be used again

fields.title: Items Per Use Max
fields.description: The maximum number of items which can be added to the composter per block interaction.

fields.title: Min Item Count
fields.description: Limits the amount of each compostable item the mob can use. Any amount held over this number will be composted if possible

fields.title: Arrival
fields.description: Event to run when the mob reaches their jobsite.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

fields.title: Use Block Max
fields.description: The maximum interval in which the mob will interact with the composter.

fields.title: Use Block Min
fields.description: The minimum interval in which the mob will interact with the composter.

fields.title: Work In Rain Tolerance
fields.description: If "can_work_in_rain" is false, this is the maximum number of ticks left in the goal where rain will not interrupt the goal

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
